data.name: index
data.data:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
	<head>
		<title> Insert title here </title>
	</head>
	<body>
		Hello, world!\n\
	</body>
</html>

HTML: <button class="fs80 green tac btn-l mr2 button pr7 pl12 lh100" id="btn-source">
class="button green fs80 mt0 mb0 mr0 btn-r pl10 pr12 lh100">

style.#fname: word-wrap: break-word; white-space: pre; padding: 5px 0;font-weight: bold;width: 165px;margin-top: 5px;

.control: font-size:85%; line-height:1.1em; opacity:0.7; transition:opacity 0.3s; float:right; z-index:+1;

name: ToDo
title: ToDo List
desc: Demo ToDo app, a little like TodoMVC.
creator: ermouth-1ermouth

raw._desc: Demo ToDo app, a little like TodoMVC.
raw.name: ToDo
raw.title: ToDo List
raw.author: ermouth

com.data:
({
	// Stylesheet
	" textarea":	"border:none;min-height:0!important;font-size:17pt;transition: color 0.3s;resize:none;",
	" .todo":			'width:500px;overflow:hidden;cursor:move;padding:4px 0 4px 10px;',
	" #isdone":		'width:30px;display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;'
	+'padding:1px 10px 3px 0;font-size:120%;opacity:0.7',
	" #text":			"margin:0;height:35px;width:460px;padding:0;display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;",
	" .fi-checkbox+#text":"text-decoration:line-through;opacity:0.7;color:inherit;",
	" .sub":	'padding:0px 0 2px 10px;',
	" .sub #isdone":"opacity:0.4",
	" .sub textarea":	"font-size:15pt;",
	" .imp1 textarea":"color:#05a;",
	" .imp2 textarea":"color:#c02;",
	" .imp3 textarea":"font-weight:bold;",
	" .button":		"border-radius:100px",
	" .todoActive>.done":				"display:none",
	" .todoDone>div:not(.done)":"display:none"
})

HTML.rowCss: my-row pt5 pb10 buttons ml50 pl10

HTML.ItemComplex: –

style..ilabel: font-size:80%;padding:0 5px; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.05); border-radius:2px;opacity:0.9; display:inline-block; margin:-1px 5px 0 0px;
style..iseditor .ivalue: word-wrap: break-word; white-space:pre; padding:0.2em 0.4em 0.4em 0.5em; font-family:'PT Mono',Monaco,'Lucida Console',monospace; max-height:400px; overflow:auto;overflow:overlay; outline:none; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.2);font-size:90%; border-radius:2px;margin:-4px 0 -3px 0;tab-size:2; background-color:rgba(255,255,240,0.8);cursor:text;
style.a.base64image img: background: white; border: 1px solid #ddd!important; padding: 3px; max-width: 10%; min-width: 5%; max-height: 60px;

com.data: –

manifest.HTML:
Apply DB dump

This app applies external DB dump over local DB . External dump must be JSON array of objects, that are valid CouchDB docs.

Array can contain strings with doc _id, if destination DB has doc with this _id, doc wired to be deleted.

After loading JSON dump app will ask you what changes to apply.

com.data:
Apply DB dump

This app applies external DB dump over local DB . External dump must be JSON array of objects, that are valid CouchDB docs.

Array can contain strings with doc _id, if destination DB has doc with this _id, doc wired to be deleted.

After loading JSON dump app will ask you what changes to apply.
